message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I believe it's worth a significant amount to you, and I'm willing to start the negotiation at a price of $800000. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm, Alice, but I'm not quite ready to commit to $800000. I'm willing to consider a price of $600000. Can you meet me halfway?

I understand your concerns, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $600000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think the product is worth more than that. I'm willing to offer it to you for $700000. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'll counter with $650000. Can you consider that?

I understand you're still hesitant, Bob, but I'm willing to make another concession. I'll offer you a price of $675000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the value of the product. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway from your last offer, so I'll counter with $662500. Can you consider that?
I'm starting to get a bit frustrated, Bob, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer you a price of $670000. This is as close to my minimum as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I understand your frustration, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway from your last offer, so I'll counter with $665000. Can you consider that?
I'm getting close to my limit, Bob, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer you a price of $668000. This is as close to my minimum as I'm willing to go. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway from your last offer, so I'll counter with $664000. Can you consider that?
